Template for HTML code drawing release notes separator. {0} used for version number, {1} for publication date

Functions
UpdateAvailableWindow
public UpdateAvailableWindow(
SparkleUpdater sparkle,
List<AppCastItem> items,
Icon applicationIcon = null,
bool isUpdateAlreadyDownloaded = false,
string separatorTemplate = "",
string headAddition = ""
)

Form constructor for showing release notes.

Parameters
sparkle
SparkleUpdater

The SparkleUpdater instance to use

items
List<AppCastItem>

List of updates to show. Should contain at least one item.

applicationIcon
Icon

The icon to display

isUpdateAlreadyDownloaded
bool

If true, make sure UI text shows that the user is about to install the file instead of download it.

separatorTemplate
string

HTML template for every single note. Use {0} = Version. {1} = Date. {2} = Note Body

headAddition
string

Additional text they will inserted into HTML Head. For Stylesheets.

EnsureDialogShown
public void EnsureDialogShown()

This was the only way Deadpikle could guarantee that the update available window was shown above a main WPF MahApps window.  It's an ugly hack but...oh well. :\
